definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: Some desires are formed as the result of rational thought pro-  cesses.
sentences.chinese: 有些慾望在理性的思考後產生。

sentences.english: Part four elaborates the author's opinion about the basis of the criminal responsibility of the actio libera in cause.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，原因自由行爲之可罰性基礎的再思考。

sentences.english: Like Stephen, I tend to be somewhat contrary by nature.
sentences.chinese: 像斯蒂芬一樣，我也是生來傾向逆向思考。

sentences.english: In this paper , the structure of macromaterialogy is discussed and the branching of technological sciences is considered.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論宏觀材料學的結構，並思考技術科學的分支。

sentences.english: Answer this question, and write an algorithm for the follow-up general case.
sentences.chinese: 回答此問題，並編寫算法求解思考題。

sentences.english: Do some critical thinking and write your thesis statement down in one sentence.
sentences.chinese: 做一些批判性的思考，並用一句話陳述出你的論點。

sentences.english: Looking at the artistic creations of Pan Li-hong gave rise to a series of thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 看了潘麗紅的美術創作，引發一連串的思考。

sentences.english: Some problems are naturally tackled that way.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種普遍的思考問題的方式。

sentences.english: We go on and on conversing in our own minds aka thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我們和自己對話的方式就是思考。

sentences.english: Finding a thread for the nanoscopic needle to pull required more thinking.
sentences.chinese: 要給納米碳管找到合適的線則需要更多的思考。

sentences.english: This makes you pause for a minute and think.
sentences.chinese: 這讓你停頓了一下，並引發了你的思考。

sentences.english: So we can think about a belief together, agreeing or disagreeing.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們可以一起來思考某個信念，同意或者不同意。

sentences.english: He can think like you, so he understands you.
sentences.chinese: 他可以像你一樣思考，所以他了解你。

sentences.english: In Vietnam, consumers are rethinking what to buy for the holiday known locally as Tet.
sentences.chinese: 在越南，消費者們正在重新思考該買些什麼過節。

sentences.english: He wants you to think about reading on his terms.
sentences.chinese: 他想讓你以他的方式來思考。

sentences.english: Thinking critically can enable one to analyze problems insightfully.
sentences.chinese: 批判性思考能夠使你在分析問題時富有洞察力。

definition: to think back over sth/to review/to revisit/to rethink/reflection/reassessment
to investigate/to delve/to probe/to enquire into/to look into
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to design/to plot/to plan out/to compose/to draw a mental sketch/conception/plan/idea/composition
methodology/Discours de la méthode by René Descartes 笛卡兒|笛卡儿[Di2 ka3 er2], 1637
